attributes.additional_details:
We question the right of a minority party, which represents a minority of the electorate, to interfere with the governance of this country.  Not only does this party attempt to block efforts to repair and rebuild the economy of this country, it also seeks to deny and repress public opinion on other important matters such as immigration, membership of the EU, foreign aid and crime.  Its ideology seems to be based on ever increasing taxation to pay for expensive and ineffective schemes, particularly those in regard of the production of energy.
We call upon the Government, and all MPs, to heed public opinion.  To listen, to set aside party differences and to work together to restore this country.
